verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> hear <WH6030> you in the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH6869>; the name <WH8034> of the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290> defend you <WH7682>;
Send <WH7971> you help <WH5828> from the sanctuary <WH6944>, and strengthen <WH5582> you out of Zion <WH6726>;
Remember <WH2142> all your offerings <WH4503>, and accept <WH1878> your burnt sacrifice <WH5930>; Selah <WH5542>.
Grant <WH5414> you according to your own heart <WH3824>, and fulfill <WH4390> all your counsel <WH6098>.
We will rejoice <WH7442> in your salvation <WH3444>, and in the name <WH8034> of our God <WH430> we will set up our banners <WH1713>: the Lord <WH3068> fulfill <WH4390> all your petitions <WH4862>.

Now know <WH3045> I that the Lord <WH3068> saves <WH3467> his anointed <WH4899>; he will hear <WH6030> him from his holy <WH6944> heaven <WH8064> with the saving <WH3468> strength <WH1369> of his right hand <WH3225>.
Some trust in chariots <WH7393>, and some in horses <WH5483>: but we will remember <WH2142> the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>.
They are brought down <WH3766> and fallen <WH5307>: but we are risen <WH6965>, and stand upright <WH5749>.
Save <WH3467>, Lord <WH3068>: let the king <WH4428> hear <WH6030> us when <WH3117> we call <WH7121>.
